title: Jasmine
description: Jasmine or as Cain calls his sister, Jazzie is a best-selling romance author known as Jasmine Blackwell. No one in her family knows that is how she is supporting herself and she wants to keep that a secret not just from them, but from everyone who knows her. Nathan is still working on his self-confidence. Since leaving the life of drugs and alcohol, his sister, Alyssa is helping him get back on his feet by having him work for her and giving him projects to be proud of. Jazzie has made Nathan aware of himself. Not just as a person but as a man. He wants to be able to do to her, what her books say and he wants the same in return for himself. But when Jasmine’s mom is around still causing trouble, will it be so easy for a relationship to bloom between Jazzie and Nathan? Welcome back to the 5th book in the Waite family series. What does Genevieve Waite have up her sleeves this time for her children and their spouses? Will she finally get what’s coming to her? With Ginny on her side, are they both unstoppable and able to get what they feel they both deserve? Someone knows their secrets.
author: Kathi S. Barton
